      • login

        public void login(java.lang.String userName,
                  java.lang.String password)
        Stores specified information on their respective fields and sets login state to true.
        Parameters:
        userName - the username to use for login
        password - the password for that user

      • sendEmail

        public void sendEmail(java.lang.String from,
                      java.lang.String to,
                      java.lang.String subject,
                      java.lang.String text)
        Creates a new session with sender and receiver info. Sends an email, from sender to receiver, with specified subject and text.
        Parameters:
        from - the email from which the message is to be sent
        to - the email the message will be sent to
        subject - the subject of the email
        text - the body of the email

      • searchGmail

        public void searchGmail(java.lang.String info,
                        java.lang.String period)
        Accesses a specific Email folder, gets all its emails and saves them on a list. Organizes the list from the most recent emails to the oldest. Chooses which emails are displayed depending on the JComboBox chosen item.
        Parameters:
        info - The keywords used on the JTextField
        period - The time period chosen on the JComboBox

      • getBody

        public void getBody(javax.mail.Message email)
        Adds to the current body the message of the specified email.
        Parameters:
        email - the email from which the body will be retrieved
